text: The ABC Scorpion is a piston aircraft engine. It's made in the UK By ABC Motors.Aeroplane Engine [ABC Scorpion] The first engine was made in 1921. == Variants == * Scorpion I * Scorpion II == Users == * ABC Robin * Boulton Paul Phoenix * BFW M.19 * BFW M.23 * Comper Swift * de Havilland Humming Bird * Farman Moustique * Hawker Cygnet * Heath Parasol * Hendy Hobo * Henderson- Glenny Gadfly * Kay Gyroplane * Luton Minor * Mignet HM.14 Pou-du-Ciel * Parmentier Wee Mite * Peyret-Mauboussin PM X * RWD 1 * SAI KZ I * Saynor & Bell Canadian Cub * Short Satellite * Snyder Buzzard * Udet U 7 Kolibri * Wheeler Slymph * Westland Woodpigeon == References == Category:ABC aircraft engines
title: ABC Scorpion
